name: Spades Cash - Win Real Prize
description:
Welcome to Spades Cash game! This is a Brand New Spades Game where you can win Cash Prizes and other Real Gifts!
Spades cash is playing in solo mode, each player gets his/her own points, then competing scores with players from all over the world, participating in tournaments to win cash prizes! More importantly, no any ads interrupting your game experience! Download the game now and and compete to win REAL MONEY now!

HOW TO PLAY:
• Make a deposit.
• Enter a head-to-head or multiplayer tournament.
• Compete against real opponents of similar skill. Each player gets the same game board, turns, and time limits.
• Beat your opponents and win CASH PRIZES!

1V1 TOURNAMENT - After you get enough practice skills, you can participate in tournaments and compete with other players to get real rewards!! Good luck & have fun!

Game Features:
• SOLO mode - There is no partnership. Each player gets his/her own points
• Comfortable game controls - Tap and Swipe to move cards
• Challenging and competitive artificial-intelligence opponents
• Tutorial - Simple and clear tutorials and scoring rules to help beginners get in the game fast
• Excellent visual experience - Amazing graphics and beautiful game themes
• No ads - uninterrupted gaming experience
• Skillz Random ensures fairness in player matching and gameplay conditions so only the most skilled competitor wins!
• Beat the clock for the highest scores!
• Free to play

If you have any questions feel free to reach us at dailypuzzle@hotmail.com
If you have any questions about the Skillz system or cash tournaments please contact: support@skillz.com
